text:
Every little bit counts in the Alabama Senate race. Help us reach $100K raised for Doug Jones by the end of today: 
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kh-doug-jones?refcode=tw171113

Walk with the wise and you become wise,
but the companion of fools fares badly. Proverbs 13:20

RT @GoodJobsNation .@SenSanders and Good Jobs Nation are calling on Donald Trump to protect truck drivers. Will Trump finally stand by workers, or let us down again? http://www.lakeconews.com/index.php/news/business/53062-sanders-calls-on-trump-to-end-exploitation-of-truck-drivers

We are LIVE! https://goo.gl/RU8ERk https://twitter.com/TeamPelosi/status/930124783219564544 QT @TeamPelosi Sen. @ChuckSchumer & I will be holding a press conference at 2pm ET on the #GOPTaxScam. Make sure to tune in here → https://goo.gl/McsHzA

An honor to meet with @NatanSharansky last week, a true hero with profound moral courage who fought for freedom against Soviet communism. I commend the @VoCommunism for honoring him with the Truman-Reagan Medal of Freedom. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOiDk5sX4AAwPZ2.jpg

The Paradise Papers make clear that we need, in the United States and throughout the world, a tax system which is fair, progressive and transparent. http://us.cnn.com/2017/11/13/opinions/oligarchy-paradise-papers-bernie-sanders-opinion/index.html

RT @FIUFootball Had to take a quick break from practice today to show support for our local Military personnel! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/928687828980129795/pu/img/8dQjOIzbiqtf3sF2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/928687828980129795/pu/pl/IdHo1ypei4wrDF9i.m3u8
I hope you’ll join me in wishing a very happy birthday to my friend and Governor of Texas, @GregAbbott_TX!

Welcome back @RandPaul! https://twitter.com/RandPaul/status/930104436705447937 QT @RandPaul Kelley and I want to thank everyone once again for your thoughts and prayers for my recovery. While I’m still in a good deal of pain, I will be returning to work in the Senate today, ready to fight for liberty and help move forward with tax cuts in the coming days and weeks.

Kelley and I want to thank everyone once again for your thoughts and prayers for my recovery. While I’m still in a good deal of pain, I will be returning to work in the Senate today, ready to fight for liberty and help move forward with tax cuts in the coming days and weeks.

If New Jersey, New York and California Republicans vote for
the #GOPTaxScam – they should spend Thanksgiving updating
their resumes. ––NP

What did the middle class ever do to the Republicans?  What did those who want to buy homes, establish community in America’s suburbs ever do to the Republicans that they’re taking this #GOPTaxScam out on them?

The essence of oligarchy is that the billionaire class is never satisfied with what they have. They want more, no matter what impact their efforts have on working people. http://www.cnn.com/2017/11/13/opinions/oligarchy-paradise-papers-bernie-sanders-opinion/index.html

Congratulations to you and @SenSherrodBrown on the newest addition to your family! 
https://twitter.com/ConnieSchultz/status/929876883898019841 QT @ConnieSchultz Grandpa @SenSherrodBrown meets granddaughter Ela Constance. So much I love about this photo: Ela’s long fingers, just like her mama’s. Sherrod’s face as he takes in the wonder of her. The ease with which he wears my old sweater because he forgot his sweatshirt. My guy, my family. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOeWFE6WsAAc2Oa.jpg

The @TexasCruzer is hitting the highways!

WATCH —> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kAOSSUr6UYQ #TXSen #CruzCrew #WeCruzn

Every American should have a right to clean air, water and an environment free of toxins. Sadly this is not the case. #EnvironmentalJusticeNow https://twitter.com/brentinmock/status/930066714703945728 QT @brentinmock Cory Booker Wants Environmental Justice to be the Law - CityLab https://www.citylab.com/equity/2017/11/cory-booker-environmental-justice/545534/

We can’t let the GOP tax plan become law. Too many middle class families will be asked to pay more. Call your members of Congress and raise your voice: (202) 224-3121.
https://twitter.com/latimes/status/928663376976281600 QT @latimes Senate GOP tax plan eliminates state income and property tax deductions, delays 20% corporate rate cut until 2019 http://lat.ms/2jdKRhO http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DONGaxVUIAAhAi3.jpg
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOiqLYQWsAI334N.jpg
The tragedy in Sutherland Springs happened a little over a week ago. Don’t let this fade into the next news cycle. We need gun safety reforms. Now.
RT @TexasCruzer We are enjoying a morning at @JoeTGarcias in Ft. Worth meeting with Texans, and soon, meeting with food.  😋 #WeCruzn #TexasCruzer http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOh17AjV4AIW_x1.jpg
I voted against Steven Bradbury’s nomination because you shouldn’t get to author memos on torturing people & then get another government job

Trump adviser and ex-banker @GaryCohn45: CEOs are “the most excited group” about GOP tax bill. Me & Bernie: No kidding. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DNowDjXWAAEUvTM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/926102608082763776/vid/1280x720/IMLW6XZ8GymV6iyv.mp4

I hope and expect that the United States will assist in disaster relief efforts for Iran, as we did in 2003 and 2012. At a time of growing tension between our two countries, this would be an important act of friendship.
I was honored to speak to many of our brave veterans onboard the USS Lexington in Corpus Christi this weekend as we celebrated #VeteransDay -> http://bit.ly/2zB6ijj

These Dreamers did everything right, mailing their DACA renewal weeks ahead of time. This is outrageous.  
https://www.nytimes.com/2017/11/10/nyregion/post-office-mail-delays-daca-applications.html

RT @IronStache I’m a union ironworker from Caledonia, Wisconsin. A Veteran. Cancer Survivor. I build things with my hands to put food on the table for my son. Today, @BernieSanders endorsed our campaign against Paul Ryan.

Watch the video of our conversation below.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CxvS_5_-1IE&feature=youtu.be
Pleased to see Erin Nealy Cox & John Bash confirmed by the Senate as U.S. Attorneys in Texas. They are both smart, principled, and dedicated to the just enforcement of the law.

Bayard Rustin once said, “You have to join every movement for the freedom of people.” 

It’s true, fighting for everyone’s civil rights is in our common interest. #MondayMotivation

Voting rights in this country are under attack. Since the Supreme Court gutted the Voting Rights Act in 2013, ten federal court decisions have found intentional discrimination against voters of color. 

One way to fight back: register to vote today.
If New Jersey, New York and California Republicans vote for the #GOPTaxScam – they should spend Thanksgiving updating their resumes. ––NP
RT @cnni We must fight back against income inequality, @SenSanders writes for @CNNopinion http://cnn.it/2ACh4CW

“In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.”
Albert Camus

The devastation from the earthquake in Iran last night is horrific. My thoughts are with the victims, their loved ones and the communities that must cope with this catastrophe. https://twitter.com/AP/status/930083011806355456 QT @AP Official tells news agencies that Iran's death toll in powerful earthquake rises to 407. http://apne.ws/pUyQv81
The walls are closing in on @NicolasMaduro as @EU_Commission readies sanctions & approves arms embargo #Venezuela https://reut.rs/2jmrO4Y
Paul Ryan is about to brand Republicans, some of the most vulnerable, suburban Members with a *huge* middle class tax hike! #GOPTaxScam http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOjm753WkAI-rn0.jpg

Tax reform is a key part of reinvigorating the American dream. That's why I support increasing the Child Tax Credit. >> https://marcorubio.com/pass-child-tax-credit/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOi0ha4VAAAPhks.jpg

Trump was clearly never serious about his promise to lower drug prices. We need an HHS secretary who will take on the drug industry's greed, not someone who has financially benefitted from it. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/930087113764327424 QT @realDonaldTrump Happy to announce, I am nominating Alex Azar to be the next HHS Secretary. He will be a star for better healthcare and lower drug prices!
